程序包 com.sismics.util.context

类 ThreadLocalContext

java.lang.Object
com.sismics.util.context.ThreadLocalContext
public class ThreadLocalContext extends Object
Context associated to a user request, and stored in a ThreadLocal.
作者:
jtremeaux
